item.title:
The difference between $2,000/mo and $200,000/mo?
Smart guys build "revolutionary frameworks"
Dumb guys copy what works
item.description:
The difference between $2,000/mo and $200,000/mo?
Smart guys build "revolutionary frameworks"
Dumb guys copy what works

item.title:
The 80/20 rule is DESTROYING solo developers:
→ AI gets you 80% in 2 days → You think you're winning → The final 20% takes 6 months → You abandon ship for the next shiny object
I'm deep in this cycle with my voice app.
Building marketing tools to market the main product.
Classic rabbit hole behavior.
STAY FOCUSED
item.description:
The 80/20 rule is DESTROYING solo developers:
→ AI gets you 80% in 2 days → You think you're winning → The final 20% takes 6 months → You abandon ship for the next shiny object
I'm deep in this cycle with my voice app.
Building marketing tools to market the main product.
Classic rabbit hole behavior.
STAY FOCUSED

item.title: Indie SaaS rarely dies from 'no features.' It dies from slow feedback. Tighten the loop: pick 1 metric per feature, ship every day, delete what doesn’t move it. You don’t need more ideas—you need faster iteration and ruthless scope.
item.description: Indie SaaS rarely dies from 'no features.' It dies from slow feedback. Tighten the loop: pick 1 metric per feature, ship every day, delete what doesn’t move it. You don’t need more ideas—you need faster iteration and ruthless scope.

item.title: Most teams overcomplicate ad creative testing. Ours auto-generates static variants by combining your product images + brand assets, pulls proven copy angles from your ad account, and ships ready-to-run creatives in minutes. Less guessing, faster learnings.
item.description: Most teams overcomplicate ad creative testing. Ours auto-generates static variants by combining your product images + brand assets, pulls proven copy angles from your ad account, and ships ready-to-run creatives in minutes. Less guessing, faster learnings.

item.title: Building a Gemini-powered creative generator. It pulls your winning ad angles, product images, and brand kit to output on-brand static variants in minutes. Aim: 20 testable creatives without waiting on design. Want early access? Reply 'beta'.
item.description: Building a Gemini-powered creative generator. It pulls your winning ad angles, product images, and brand kit to output on-brand static variants in minutes. Aim: 20 testable creatives without waiting on design. Want early access? Reply 'beta'.

item.title: If your AI app needs a tutorial, your UX is the bug. I'm building with Gemini and the bar is simple: first run delivers an "oh wow" in under 60s, zero docs. Every extra toggle = one more user lost. Remove steps until it feels inevitable.
item.description: If your AI app needs a tutorial, your UX is the bug. I'm building with Gemini and the bar is simple: first run delivers an "oh wow" in under 60s, zero docs. Every extra toggle = one more user lost. Remove steps until it feels inevitable.

item.title: I built a creative engine that pairs Gemini with your ad data. It pulls top-performing angles, blends them with your product images + brand kit, chooses typography, and outputs fresh static variants in minutes. Faster tests, tighter feedback loops, cheaper wins.
item.description: I built a creative engine that pairs Gemini with your ad data. It pulls top-performing angles, blends them with your product images + brand kit, chooses typography, and outputs fresh static variants in minutes. Faster tests, tighter feedback loops, cheaper wins.

item.title: Static ads still print if your creative velocity is high. I built a Gemini workflow that pulls your top‑performing ad data, blends it with product images + brand kit, and generates on‑brand variants fast. Pick a font, review, ship. More shots on goal, lower CPA.
item.description: Static ads still print if your creative velocity is high. I built a Gemini workflow that pulls your top‑performing ad data, blends it with product images + brand kit, and generates on‑brand variants fast. Pick a font, review, ship. More shots on goal, lower CPA.

item.title: Static ads don't need 'inspiration', they need inputs. Pipe product images + brand kit + winning creative data into Gemini, lock type + layout, then spin 20 variants. Score by CTR/CVR, ship the top 2, archive the rest. Creativity at the speed of ops.
item.description: Static ads don't need 'inspiration', they need inputs. Pipe product images + brand kit + winning creative data into Gemini, lock type + layout, then spin 20 variants. Score by CTR/CVR, ship the top 2, archive the rest. Creativity at the speed of ops.

item.title: Gemini-powered creative engine: pull a brand’s assets via API (think Lululemon), fuse old + new, auto-generate an infinite scroll of on-brand product shots for Meta. Not replacing designers—weaponizing what already converts.
item.description: Gemini-powered creative engine: pull a brand’s assets via API (think Lululemon), fuse old + new, auto-generate an infinite scroll of on-brand product shots for Meta. Not replacing designers—weaponizing what already converts.

item.title: Brands don’t need more shoots. They need multiplication. → Pull approved assets via API (e.g., Lululemon) → Gemini combines old + new to fill missing angles/variations → Scrollable mosaic = instant Meta ad creatives Fewer shoots. Faster iteration. Lower CAC.
item.description: Brands don’t need more shoots. They need multiplication. → Pull approved assets via API (e.g., Lululemon) → Gemini combines old + new to fill missing angles/variations → Scrollable mosaic = instant Meta ad creatives Fewer shoots. Faster iteration. Lower CAC.

item.title: The fix for ad creative fatigue: pull proven brand assets via API, let Gemini recombine, and ship a scrolling mosaic of on-brand product shots for instant testing. Faster cycles, consistent look, lower CAC.
item.description: The fix for ad creative fatigue: pull proven brand assets via API, let Gemini recombine, and ship a scrolling mosaic of on-brand product shots for instant testing. Faster cycles, consistent look, lower CAC.

item.title: Built an ads generator that remixes what already converts: pull top Meta creatives from your niche (think Lululemon’s best), blend with your product shots + brand assets, run through Gemini Flash. Result: 30–100 fresh variants in minutes, not weeks.
item.description: Built an ads generator that remixes what already converts: pull top Meta creatives from your niche (think Lululemon’s best), blend with your product shots + brand assets, run through Gemini Flash. Result: 30–100 fresh variants in minutes, not weeks.

item.title: Most teams waste time ideating ads from scratch. We scrape your category's winners, pair with your product shots, and let Gemini Flash remix 100 variants in minutes. Result: faster tests, lower CAC. Creative ops is a data problem, not a design problem.
item.description: Most teams waste time ideating ads from scratch. We scrape your category's winners, pair with your product shots, and let Gemini Flash remix 100 variants in minutes. Result: faster tests, lower CAC. Creative ops is a data problem, not a design problem.

item.title:
just blew my mind: took Lululemon's top 20 performing Meta ads fed them into Gemini Flash w/ brand assets → generated 100+ new creatives in 1hr → 47% better CTR than original ads
most marketers spend 5-7 hrs on ONE creative we're doing 100x the output, 2x the results 🤯
item.description:

item.title:
Just witnessed the future of content creation.
AI mapped a TikTok automation pipeline in 30 seconds:
Viral hooks → AI backgrounds → full edits → done.
While you make 1 video/day, this system ships 50.
Build systems, not bottlenecks.
item.description:
Just witnessed the future of content creation.
AI mapped a TikTok automation pipeline in 30 seconds:
Viral hooks → AI backgrounds → full edits → done.
While you make 1 video/day, this system ships 50.
Build systems, not bottlenecks.

item.title: Prototyped a fully automated TikTok factory last night: viral hook → AI background → auto-caption → render. 45‑min sprint to wire the pipeline. Lesson: speed > polish. Ship the scaffold, then tune prompts. Want the steps? I’ll post the checklist if there’s interest.
item.description: Prototyped a fully automated TikTok factory last night: viral hook → AI background → auto-caption → render. 45‑min sprint to wire the pipeline. Lesson: speed > polish. Ship the scaffold, then tune prompts. Want the steps? I’ll post the checklist if there’s interest.

item.title: An AI assistant just gave me a 30s executive brief: calendar triage, 3 critical emails, and content metrics. Most founders burn 2+ hours to get that clarity. This is the $10M productivity unlock: one feed, zero noise.
item.description: An AI assistant just gave me a 30s executive brief: calendar triage, 3 critical emails, and content metrics. Most founders burn 2+ hours to get that clarity. This is the $10M productivity unlock: one feed, zero noise.

item.title:
AI assistant running a creator's ops: - calendar blocks - content pipeline - performance analytics
Most are still posting manually.
They're building a fully automated TikTok factory.
item.description:
AI assistant running a creator's ops: - calendar blocks - content pipeline - performance analytics

item.title: Built a Gossip Girl–style meme pipeline that turns 2AM support chaos into TikToks while I sleep. Hook = relatable pain, punchline = product does the work, last frame = CTA. 80% automation, 20% taste. Shipping 3 today.
item.description: Built a Gossip Girl–style meme pipeline that turns 2AM support chaos into TikToks while I sleep. Hook = relatable pain, punchline = product does the work, last frame = CTA. 80% automation, 20% taste. Shipping 3 today.

item.title: Built an automated TikTok pipeline: steal viral templates (Gossip Girl), swap in customer support pain points (2am "can you...?" messages), add a clear CTA. 30 mins/day → 3 clips. Relatable, repeatable, and it actually converts while you sleep.
item.description: Built an automated TikTok pipeline: steal viral templates (Gossip Girl), swap in customer support pain points (2am "can you...?" messages), add a clear CTA. 30 mins/day → 3 clips. Relatable, repeatable, and it actually converts while you sleep.

item.title:
Lawrence just built the most insane AI ops system I’ve seen.
10‑min morning briefs that cover: → Calendar optimization → Content gap scan → Billing automation → Performance breakdowns
While you’re still checking Instagram…
He’s running a MACHINE.

item.title: Just wrapped the workflow: automated goth-girl slideshow pipeline for TikTok 🖤 → Clip selector + style overlay → Batch render → API posting Input: 10 min morning brain dump. Output: a week of posts. Systems > motivation.
item.description: Just wrapped the workflow: automated goth-girl slideshow pipeline for TikTok 🖤 → Clip selector + style overlay → Batch render → API posting Input: 10 min morning brain dump. Output: a week of posts. Systems > motivation.

item.title: This is what real automation looks like: morning thoughts → viral TikToks. Lawrence built a system; you’re still uploading 1 video/week. 50+ pieces from a single input. The gap widens every day you delay.
item.description: This is what real automation looks like: morning thoughts → viral TikToks. Lawrence built a system; you’re still uploading 1 video/week. 50+ pieces from a single input. The gap widens every day you delay.
